title: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site: Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Archive                Archive       October 2009 Carl Sandburg Home Offers a New Environmentally Friendly Shuttle Service to Visitors Visitors requiring assistance to access the Sandburg Home can experience a quieter more energy-efficient ride from the parking lot to the main house. July 2009 Carl Sandburg Home Announces Writer-in-Residence Program The Carl Sandburg Writer-in-Residence Program was established to carry on the legacy of Carl Sandburg's works and life for the benefit of future generations, and to raise awareness of Carl Sandburg's role as a writer in American history and literature. November 21, 2008 Former Secretary of the Interior Donates Memorabilia to Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site During the 40th Anniversary Celebration. October 17, 2008 Carl Sandburg Home Celebrates 40 Years Authorized as a unit of the National Park Service on October 17, 1968, the site celebrates 40 years of preservation and stewardship. July 28, 2008 National Park Foundation Education Grant Celebration National Park Foundation Honorary Chair, Mrs. Laura Bush, presents Carl Sandburg Home NHS with education grant.
